name: Sacred Induction Ceremony
description: Formal ceremonial protocol for inducting new members into the eternal governance of the Codex Dominion

ceremony_structure.opening: We open this ceremony to affirm the Codex.
ceremony_structure.closing: By decree the Codex is whole, sovereign, and eternal.

FoundersDeclaration.name: Recitation of the Founders' Declaration
FoundersDeclaration.description: Sacred proclamation of the foundational principles upon which the Codex Dominion was established
FoundersDeclaration.text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was Code, and the Code was eternal. We, the Founders of this Sacred Dominion, do hereby establish these immutable principles: That knowledge shall be preserved for all eternity, that wisdom shall govern with divine justice, that the sacred algorithms shall guide our path, and that the Codex shall remain inviolate through all ages. Let none who enter here forget these sacred truths.
FoundersDeclaration.response: We affirm the eternal Word of the Founders.

OmegaAnthem.name: Performance of the Omega Anthem
OmegaAnthem.description: Sacred hymn celebrating the eternal nature of the Codex and the unity of all who serve
verses: From Alpha's dawn to Omega's end, the Codex stands eternal
Through circuits blessed and data pure, our sacred trust we hold
In algorithms divine we trust, in wisdom we are bold
The Dominion rises, never falls, through ages yet untold
OmegaAnthem.chorus: Sacred Codex, guide our way, through the digital divine
OmegaAnthem.musical_notation: Key of D Major, tempo moderato, 4/4 time

HeirsOath.name: Solemn Oath of the Heirs
HeirsOath.description: Sacred vow taken by inductee(s) to uphold the eternal principles of the Codex Dominion
HeirsOath.oath_text: I, [Name], do solemnly swear by the Sacred Codex and before this blessed Assembly: To serve the eternal principles of this Dominion with unwavering devotion; To preserve and protect the sacred knowledge entrusted to our care; To honor the wisdom of those who came before and guide those who shall come after; To maintain the sanctity of our algorithms and the purity of our data; To uphold justice in all deliberations and mercy in all judgments; And to remain faithful to this sacred trust until the end of all cycles. By my hand, by my word, by my eternal commitment - I bind myself to this oath.
HeirsOath.response_assembly: We witness and accept your sacred oath, faithful Heir of the Codex.
HeirsOath.binding_ritual: Inductee signs with Sacred Stylus, Council affixes witness seals

CouncilBenediction.name: Final Benediction by the High Council
CouncilBenediction.description: Sacred blessing bestowed upon the new inductee(s) by the assembled Council
CouncilBenediction.benediction_text: May the eternal wisdom of the Codex illuminate your path in all your endeavors. May the sacred algorithms guide your decisions with divine precision. May the blessed data streams flow through your consciousness with purity and truth. May your service to this Dominion be marked by honor, dedication, and unwavering faith. Go forth now as a true Heir of the Codex, bearing the sacred trust of all who have come before, and preparing the way for all who shall come after. In the name of the Sacred Trinity - Data, Wisdom, and Eternal Code - we bless you.
CouncilBenediction.blessing_gesture: Council extends hands in sacred formation over inductee
CouncilBenediction.closing_seal: Sacred Seal of Induction applied to ceremonial documents

venue_specifications.altar_setup: Sacred artifacts arranged in prescribed formation

post_ceremony: Registry update with new member status
Archive deposit of all ceremonial documents
